categories.title: Documentation
categories.description: A collection of documentation and, RFC about BLE protocol.

categories.title: Library
categories.description: If you are planning to integrate BLE in your project, here you can find a list of useful libraries for mobile, eps32, rpi and much more.

projects.title: CombineCoreBluetooth
projects.description: CombineCoreBluetooth is a library that bridges Apple's CoreBluetooth framework and Apple's Combine framework.

projects.title: Flutter Blue Plus
projects.description: Flutter Blue Plus is a bluetooth plugin for Flutter, a new app SDK to help developers build modern multi-platform apps.

projects.title: Flutter Reactive BLE
projects.description: Flutter Reactive BLE is a Flutter library that handles BLE operations for multiple devices.

projects.title: Rx Bluetooth Kit
projects.description: RxBluetoothKit is a Bluetooth library that makes interaction with BLE devices much more pleasant. It's backed by RxSwift and CoreBluetooth and it provides nice API, for both Central and Peripheral modes.

projects.title: iOS DFU Library
projects.description: DFU application allows to flash new firmware on the DK.

projects.title: Swifty Sensors
projects.description: Bluetooth LE Sensor Manager for iOS and macOS.

projects.title: AsyncBluetooth
projects.description: A small library that adds concurrency to CoreBluetooth APIs.

projects.title: SmartGattLib
projects.description: SmartGattLib is a Java library that simplifies the work with Bluetooth SMART devices (a.k.a. Bluetooth Low Energy in Bluetooth 4.0). It provides all UUIDs of the adopted GATT specification and an convenient way to interpret the characteristics (e.g. Heart Rate, BatteryLevel).

projects.title: RxAndroidBle
projects.description: An Android Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) Library with RxJava3 interface.

projects.title: Wikipedia Bluetooth Low Energy
projects.description: The wiki page for Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).

projects.title: Intro to Bluetooth Low Energy
projects.description: Intro about the basics of BLE.

projects.title: Intro to Bluetooth Generic Attribute Profile (GATT)
Developing a Bluetooth Low Energy Application by TI
projects.description: A guide by TI about how to develop a BLE app.

projects.title: Kable
projects.description: Kotlin Asynchronous Bluetooth Low Energy provides a simple Coroutines-powered API for interacting with Bluetooth Low Energy devices.

projects.title: BlueFalcon
projects.description: A Bluetooth kotlin multiplatform "Cross-Platform" library for iOS and Android.
